decks.notes: This deck focuses on using a combination of Elves and creatures with abilities that allow for fast mana generation and card advantage to quickly assemble the necessary pieces to win the game. The key strategy involves utilizing Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling to search for crucial combo pieces like Allosaurus Shepherd and Springheart Nantuko while utilizing wirewood symbiote and quirion ranger to generate mana. The end goal is to either generate an overwhelming board state or facilitate the victory condition with Thassa's Oracle.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping out Eldrazi creatures and disrupting opponents with Chalice of the Void while also utilizing cards like Thought-Knot Seer for hand disruption. The key concept involves using Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to accelerate the deployment of powerful Eldrazi creatures, making it difficult for the opponent to keep up with the sheer size and speed of the threats. The inclusion of cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Gaea's Cradle provide additional utility and mana generation to overwhelm opponents and secure victory through aggressive plays and powerful creatures.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on casting powerful Eldrazi creatures quickly by utilizing mana ramp and disruption with cards like Lotus Petal and Chalice of the Void. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures like It That Heralds the End and Thought-Knot Seer while also disrupting their game plan with cards like Wasteland and Kozilek's Command. By utilizing Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin, the deck can quickly deploy its threats and apply pressure early in the game, making it difficult for the opponent to recover.

This combo deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures using spells like Entomb and Reanimate, then using cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill the library and win the game with Thassa's Oracle. Protection comes in the form of Pact of Negation and Chancellor of the Annex, while acceleration is provided by cards like Dark Ritual and Lotus Petal. The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo pieces and win the game in a single explosive turn.

The deck aims to control the game through countering opponent's spells, disrupting their strategy, and protecting its own threats. It utilizes cards like Force of Will, Daze, and Pyroblast to interact with the opponent while also generating card advantage with Brainstorm and Mishra's Bauble. The win condition is to play a threat like Murktide Regent or Dragon's Rage Channeler, protect it with counter magic, and close out the game. The deck also includes some removal spells like Fatal Push and Unholy Heat to deal with opposing threats.

This deck focuses on utilizing various creatures and spells to control the game and out value the opponent. The main strategy involves ramping up mana quickly with cards like Noble Hierarch and Gaea's Cradle, while also using Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for key creatures like Wight of the Relinquary and Springheart Nantuko. Natural Order is used to quickly bring out powerful threats like Craterhoof Behemoth. The deck also includes disruption cards like Endurance and Collector Ouphe to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence and efficient removal options.

This Dredge combo deck utilizes cards like Golgari Grave-Troll, Stinkweed Imp, and Faithless Looting to quickly fill the graveyard. By sacrificing Narcomoeba and generating Zombie tokens with Bridge from Below, the deck can overwhelm opponents with a swarm of creatures. The deck also includes disruption cards like Cabal Therapy to disrupt the opponent's game plan while continuing to dredge through the deck with cards like Cephalid Coliseum. The goal is to quickly assemble a board presence and use cards like Dread Return to bring back powerful creatures like Ox of Agonas for a lethal attack.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Doomsday combo to win the game. The goal is to set up a winning pile of cards using Personal Tutor and Doomsday, with backup protection from Force of Will and Thoughtseize. Brainstorm and Ponder help with card selection and digging for combo pieces, while rituals and mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal help speed up the process. Thassa's Oracle is the win condition once the combo is assembled, allowing the player to win the game on the spot. The deck aims to quickly and efficiently assemble the combo for a powerful finish.
